definition: (of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: We're still not completely free of the potential of write-downs in financial securities.
sentences.chinese: 我們還是沒有完全擺脫金融證券沖銷的可能性。

sentences.english: And all businesses will beable to continue writing off the investments they make in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 而且所有的企業將沖銷2012年的投資。

sentences.english: Day-trading pros must pick professional venue.
sentences.chinese: 贊成當日沖銷，但必須挑選專業的場所。
